object.text: Excellent menu, impeccable service, views of the ocean and pier, cocktails before or after in the sumptuous hotel lobby make you feel like visiting royalty. On my list of favourites.

object.text: Happy Hour (5-7pm) at Casa Del Mar hotel. Rolls for $2, Nigiri $4, Edamame $2, Oysters for $4, Specialty Cocktails- $5. Amazing deal and the sushi is pretty darn good.
